title: Roasted butternut squash soup
description: This easy butternut squash soup recipe is completely dairy-free! It has added red pepper and ginger, and is deliciously smooth. For this recipe you will need a 3.5–4 litre/6–7 pint deep-sided saucepan.
ingredients: 1.5kg/3lb 5oz peeled and deseeded butternut squash, cut into 3cm/1¼in cubes (see tip)
1 red pepper, deseeded and cut into cubes
5cm/2in piece fresh root ginger, peeled and chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
